name: Culture
description: Culture category is for company culture related questions.

name: Workflow
description: Workflow category is for day-to-day working practises related questions.

name: Tools
description: Tools category is for questions related to using DevOps tools.

name: Skills
description: Skills category is for questions to assess company readiness to embrace DevOps.

name: Code
description: Code category is for questions to assess how easily the codebase will comply with DevOps automation and practises.
